Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db0A6Resulta.name: E3dbResult
Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db0A6Resulta.abstract: A type that contains either a value of type T or an E3dbError

Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db9PlainMetaa.name: PlainMeta
Typealiases.html#/s:4E3db9PlainMetaa.abstract: A type that holds arbitrary metadata for a record in cleartext

Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html#/s:4E.name: writerId
Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html#/s:4E.abstract: The identifier for the user sharing with the client

Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html#/s:4E.name: readerId
Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html#/s:4E.abstract: An identifier for a user with whom to share

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.name: apiKeyId
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.abstract: An identifier for the key for use with the E3db service

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.name: apiSecret
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.abstract: A secret to use with the E3db service

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.name: publicKey
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.abstract: The public key registered with the E3db service and used for encryption

Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.name: enabled
Structs/ClientCredentials.html#/s:4E3db1.abstract: A flag indicating whether this client is active

Structs/Record.html#/s:4E3db6RecordV4met.name: meta
Structs/Record.html#/s:4E3db6RecordV4met.abstract: Metadata about the record, such as record ID, creation date, etc.

Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV8writerI.name: writerId
Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV8writerI.abstract: An identifier for the writer of the record

Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV6userId1.name: userId
Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV6userId1.abstract: An identifier for the user of the record

Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV4typeSSv.name: type
Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV4typeSSv.abstract: The kind of data this record represents

Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV7created.name: created
Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV7created.abstract: The timestamp marking the record’s creation date, in ISO 8601 format

Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV12lastMo.name: lastModified
Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV12lastMo.abstract: The timestamp marking the record’s most recent change, in ISO 8601 format

Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV7version.name: version
Structs/Meta.html#/s:4E3db4MetaV7version.abstract: An identifier for the current version of the record

Structs/RecordData.html#/s:4E3db10Record.name: init(cleartext:)
Structs/RecordData.html#/s:4E3db10Record.abstract: Initializer to create a structure to hold unencrypted data.

Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:4E3db13Que.abstract: A list of records matching the provided query.

Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:4E3db13Que.name: last
Structs/QueryResponse.html#/s:4E3db13Que.abstract: An identifier for the final result of the query.

Structs/QueryParams.html#/s:4E3db11Query.abstract: Initializer to specify filters for querying records

Structs/QueryParams.html#/s:4E3db11Query.name: next(after:)
Structs/QueryParams.html#/s:4E3db11Query.abstract: Advance the query beyond the given value, leaving other parameters unchanged.

Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigV9api.abstract: The API secret for making authenticated calls

Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigV10ba.abstract: The base URL for the E3DB service

Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigVACSS.abstract: Initializer to customize the configuration of the client. Typically, library users will

Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigVACSg.name: init(loadProfile:userPrompt:)
Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigVACSg.abstract: Load a profile from the device’s secure enclave if available.

Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigV4sav.name: save(profile:)
Structs/Config.html#/s:4E3db6ConfigV4sav.abstract: Save a profile to the device’s secure enclave if available.

Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:4E3db7KeyPairV06.abstract: The public Curve25519 key from a generated keypair as a Base64URL encoded string.

Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:4E3db7KeyPairV06.name: secretKey
Structs/KeyPair.html#/s:4E3db7KeyPairV06.abstract: The private Curve25519 key from a generated keypair as a Base64URL encoded string.

Structs/KeyPair.html.name: KeyPair
Structs/KeyPair.html.abstract: A data type holding the public and private Curve25519 keys as

Structs/QueryParams.html.abstract: Data type to specify filters for querying records

Structs/QueryResponse.html.name: QueryResponse
Structs/QueryResponse.html.abstract: A structure to hold a response from a query operation

Structs/Meta.html.name: Meta
Structs/Meta.html.abstract: A type to hold metadata information about a given record

Structs/Record.html.name: Record
Structs/Record.html.abstract: A type that holds unencrypted values and associated metadata

Structs/ClientCredentials.html.name: ClientCredentials
Structs/ClientCredentials.html.abstract: A type that contains the registration response info

Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html.name: OutgoingSharingPolicy
Structs/OutgoingSharingPolicy.html.abstract: A type to describe an existing policy for records

Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html.name: IncomingSharingPolicy
Structs/IncomingSharingPolicy.html.abstract: A type to describe an existing policy for records

Enums/E3dbError.html#/s:4E3db0A5ErrorO11.abstract: Get a human-readable context for the error.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC15ge.name: generateKeyPair()
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC15ge.abstract: A helper function to create a compatible key pair for E3db operations.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC5que.name: query(params:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC5que.abstract: Search for records that match a given set of filters.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC5wri.name: write(type:data:plain:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC5wri.abstract: Write a record to the E3db service. This will encrypt the RecordData fields (leaving the keys as plaintext)

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC4rea.name: read(recordId:fields:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC4rea.abstract: Request and decrypt a record from the E3db service.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC6upd.name: update(meta:newData:plain:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC6upd.abstract: Replace the data and plain metadata for a record identified by its Meta. This will overwrite

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC6del.name: delete(recordId:version:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC6del.abstract: Remove the record from the E3db service.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC8reg.name: register(token:clientName:publicKey:apiUrl:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC8reg.abstract: Provide registration information to the E3db service to create a new client

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC5sha.name: share(type:readerId:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC5sha.abstract: Allow another user to view and decrypt records of a given type.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC6rev.name: revoke(type:readerId:completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC6rev.abstract: Remove a user’s access to view and decrypt records of a given type.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC18ge.name: getOutgoingSharing(completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC18ge.abstract: Request the list of policies allowing other users to view and decrypt this client’s records.

Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC18ge.name: getIncomingSharing(completion:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:4E3db6ClientC18ge.abstract: Request the list of policies allowing this client to view and decrypt records written by other users.

Classes/Client.html.name: Client
Classes/Client.html.abstract: Main E3db class to handle data operations.
